title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative Area
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Administrative Area 

of Kilkenny County council) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (administrative area kilkenny county council) order 2023

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 31 August 2023.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 31 August 2023.

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Kilkenny County
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Administrative Area of Kilkenny County 
Council is prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period commencing on 
31 August 2023 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 August, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [431] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting administrative area kilkenny county council prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 31 august 2023 ending 31 december 2024 given official seal 30 august 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st september 2023 431 3

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Administrative Area of Kilkenny 
County Council as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and Development 
(Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period commencing on 
31 August 2023 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [431]
